metadata.title: CVE-2013-4522 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
lib/filelib.php in Moodle through 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.10, 2.4.x before2.4.7, and 2.5.x before 2.5.3 does not send "Cache-Control: private" HTTPheaders, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information byrequesting a file that had been previously retrieved by a caching proxyserver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-1').
